The Slime King's slam attack will do arm: The Slime King's slam attack will do armor piercing damage, be careful!
Naga Acid is very dangerous. Try to evad: Naga Acid is very dangerous. Try to evade their ranged attacks and return fire!
Collect all 12 of the Legendary Eyes to: Collect all 12 of the Legendary Eyes to open a portal to The End. This is no easy task!
Humanoid monsters can special attack wit: Humanoid monsters can special attack with their weapons!
The Blackmarket Cache is high risk high: The Blackmarket Cache is high risk high reward!
The Tinkers Construct Katana has a uniqu: The Tinkers Construct Katana has a unique ability, it can be used to block after landing a hit! Katanas are the only weapon to possess this power!
If you die 3 times while fighting a boss: If you die 3 times while fighting a boss, their health will regenerate!
Create Trains are an awesome way to trav: Create Trains are an awesome way to travel! When powered with Coal they can travel up to 1 thousand blocks a minute!
The difficulty changes in Master Mode an: The difficulty changes in Master Mode and Expert mode are per player! So play at your own pace!
New player? check out the ingame tutoria: New player? check out the ingame tutorial presented by our friend Barry!
Waystones are an excellent form of quick: Waystones are an excellent form of quick transportation, they use XP to teleport you, you can find Waystones scattered throughout the world.
Eating complex foods can reward you with: Eating complex foods can reward you with bonus saturation and sometimes positive status effects.
Cheese can be used to tame rats!: Cheese can be used to tame rats!
What mysteries exist in space? It's up t: What mysteries exist in space? It's up to you to find out!
The Reservoir from Thermal Expansion can: The Reservoir from Thermal Expansion can be used as a larger bucket for most crafting recipes requiring fluid!
Have you tried exploring? There are doze: Have you tried exploring? There are dozens of unique dungeons to uncover!
The Carcass can be reanimated with a Fli: The Carcass can be reanimated with a Flint and Steel!
Crocodiles are apex predators, avoid eng: Crocodiles are apex predators, avoid engaging them in combat at all costs!
If you want to protect your pets from th: If you want to protect your pets from the cold grasp of death, look into Soulbound!
Different Spell Schools have different s: Different Spell Schools have different strengths and weaknesses!
The Wither is not what it seems.. Tread: The Wither is not what it seems.. Tread carefully..
Large Water Wheels Produce 512 Stress Un: Large Water Wheels Produce 512 Stress Units!
Multiblocks can exhibit unexpected behav: Multiblocks can exhibit unexpected behavior when they cross chunks. Press F9 twice to see chunk borders.
Daily Quests can be completed every day!: Daily Quests can be completed every day! You can find the Daily Quests you've unlocked in your Quest  Book.
Strays have a chance to freeze their tar: Strays have a chance to freeze their targets, this effect will go through shields! Make sure to evade their attacks!
After killing a boss, a rift will appear: After killing a boss, a rift will appear! click the rift to activate it! click it again to teleport you home!
Don't put backpacks in backpacks... And: Don't put backpacks in backpacks... And do not put containers that store items into your ME system - you might have a hard time extracting them again
By doing Quests you can collect Coins, t: By doing Quests you can collect Coins, these coins can be spent at the Quest Shop!
The Nether in MCE2 is a scary & big plac: The Nether in MCE2 is a scary & big place! Set Waypoints!
Running out of inventory space? Craft a: Running out of inventory space? Craft a backpack!
Immersive Aircraft offers numerous metho: Immersive Aircraft offers numerous methods of awesome air based travel!
You can use /tpa to teleport to a friend: You can use /tpa to teleport to a friend!
Try new mods! You might find new and enj: Try new mods! You might find new and enjoyable ways to accomplish ordinary tasks!
Watch out! Certain humanoid creatures ca: Watch out! Certain humanoid creatures can dodge, roll and use special attacks! Avoid heavy attacks or you might get stunned!
Stay in Normal Mode if you wish! The gam: Stay in Normal Mode if you wish! The game will only get harder when you want it to!
Cloud storage is a low tech storage solu: Cloud storage is a low tech storage solution! Send your items up into the cloud!
Never touched a certain mod before and w: Never touched a certain mod before and want advice? Why not join the MC Eternal Discord for help!
You can only damage Ghosts with magic da: You can only damage Ghosts with magic damage or silver weapons!
Creepers have a small chance to explode: Creepers have a small chance to explode into fireworks!
Some bosses have projectile immunity at: Some bosses have projectile immunity at a certain distance!
MC Eternal 2 has difficulty modes, after: MC Eternal 2 has difficulty modes, after reaching major milestones new creatures will begin to spawn!
Look out for the Plague! if you become i: Look out for the Plague! if you become infected, you won't be able to regenerate health until the effect has worn off! Plague Doctors can sometimes sell you the cure.
Every day you log in you can claim a Dai: Every day you log in you can claim a Daily Reward! use /DailyRewards Claim to check your progress!
Guard Villagers are an elite group of tr: Guard Villagers are an elite group of trained villagers who have a sworn duty to protect the village. Do not attack or steal from villagers when they are present!
Every Curio usually has either a unique: Every Curio usually has either a unique ability or bonus stats for the wielder, except for cosmetic ones!
Sleeping in a bed for a full night will: Sleeping in a bed for a full night will restore all of your health and remove negative status effects! Gotta get that beauty sleep!
Scute can be used to craft Turtle Armor: Scute can be used to craft Turtle Armor which provides resistance and increased swim speed at the cost of slowness on land!
Eating new foods can sometimes reward bo: Поедание новых продуктов иногда может вознаградить бонусными сердцами!
